legacy.full_text: 我的离任拜会从议长～开始，我非常感谢议长先生为促进两国立法机构以及人文交流和经贸合作所做努力，也感谢他在新冠疫情爆发关键时刻站出来表态说塞浦路斯不允许任何歧视他国公民现象，我非常珍惜我们个人之间的友谊。 https://t.co/viCSKMetjr
Chinese Embassy in Cyprus - Online Reception Farewell by Ambassador HUANG Xingyuan on Facebook. Watch here:➡️ https://t.co/oFRCBhk51g https://t.co/AjMxYoYLsr

As former head of a China top think tank, I fully support the joint statement from a July 25 event called NO TO THE NEW COLD WAR by scholars from 48 countries, calling on US to abandon Cold War mentality as it is against Humanity & build China-US relations based on dialogue. https://t.co/aEMOH5AmAN

20years ago, some offered protection to a cult in China, resulting in many deaths. 200days ago, some ignored China’s alert for coronavirus outbreak, which led to current disaster. 2000 hours later, will these people get what they deserve from spreading a political virus to China? https://t.co/r7iR7ds04t

My time in Cyprus is coming to an end…
My wife and I invite you to join us in an online reception to say our goodbyes; unfortunately we cannot do this in person due to COVID-19 protocol.
Noon on Tuesday, July 28 on Twitter or Facebook. 
Details below: https://t.co/cirIPcOqPw

The Chinese admire Nixon for shelving ideological differences in favor of US interests and taking his ice breaking trip to China that inaugurated China-US diplomatic ties. I suppose he would not be pleased to see someone today launching a Cold War in the Richard Nixon Library. https://t.co/Ou7GSR8vp9

A gift from a friend who studied & worked in Houston for 30 years: clay model of a boat from ancient Cyprus representing trading cultures of the past & today’s community with a shared destiny, similar to story of warring states in same boat from ancient 🇨🇳. We were wiser then... https://t.co/6Yq1ZBHtDd

We have two sayings in China, also found in USA: 
YOU REAP WHAT YOU SOW: US Consulate in Chengdu will be closed in response to US closing of Chinese Consulate in Houston. 
SHOOT YOURSELF IN THE FOOT: one will get his just rewards for scapegoating- 4m cases & 140k COVID-19 deaths. https://t.co/Nutx1KmMUQ
中国人常说的两句话給大家解释一下吧。一是”出来混总是要还的”，你关闭我休斯顿机构，我就关闭你成都的机构。二是搬起石头砸自己的脚，你甩锅推责的结果是你必须要为400万感染和14万死亡数字负责。 https://t.co/529H6i1WR7

President Xi: Amidst rising protectionism & shrinking markets, tap into our domestic market; connect it to global markets; utilize resources for more sustainable growth;  push reform & opening-up; promote an open economy & a community with a shared future for mankind. https://t.co/c3VZhNCT8V

To protect & strengthen enterprises, President Xi proposed to support & inject more dynamism into them; implement policy to help them solve problems & overcome financial trouble; create a global market-based business environment built on rule of law & NOT trading power for money. https://t.co/MKSzG1vhgg

President Xi stressed at the symposium that we must unleash the dynamics of markets via an entrepreneurial spirit; push enterprises to pursue development & further economic growth;  beef up confidence to overcome difficulties and strive to make up for losses caused by COVID-19. https://t.co/7gPVIl1vXJ

🇨🇳's economy grew an impressive 3.2% in Q2 against huge sacrifices made to fight COVID-19, severe flooding & foreign disruptions. To consolidate this hard-won achievement, President Xi Jinping presided at this juncture over a significant symposium with entrepreneurs in Beijing. https://t.co/tFNnF0Fp4b

A former student asked for my definition of DIPLOMACY. I see it as the art of forging ties, seeking consensus, an exemplar for observing rules and a means to cooperation. Diplomacy will soon be redefined after Secretary Pompeo’s visit to Europe which specifically targets China. https://t.co/L6m4BNnCWh

A repatriation flight carried back to China last night 133 Chinese citizens stranded in Cyprus due to COVID-19. A big thanks to the Cyprus government for their assistance. Looking forward to direct flights between 🇨🇳 - 🇨🇾 & to more Chinese tourists visiting this beautiful island. https://t.co/NMueuITgzx

Six members of management team from China Petroleum Pipeline for the Cyprus LNG import terminal just arrived at Larnaca airport by a repatriation flight yesterday. They will start working after self-isolating for 14 days. Appreciate it and welcome.
Let’s get to work Cyprus! https://t.co/0eEDGPlGXk

I was awaken by the siren this morning… 

July 20 carries painful memories of Cyprus. Foreign invasion and interference, betrayal and appeasement of big powers left Cyprus divided till today. 

Siren reminds us of history and sounds warnings for us all. 

#CYPRUSTRONG https://t.co/yVgYaNASBr

Reasoning is for the reasonable. 
Wang Yi called on countries to come together for peace and development guided by multilateralism, and build an open, inclusive, clean and beautiful post-COVID-19 world that enjoys lasting peace, security and prosperity for all. Let’s get to work. https://t.co/kLW1qaRLmS

Wang Yi proposed to uphold multilateralism & reject protectionism; support democracy & reject hegemony; safeguard international order born by international law & reject unlawful acts AND double standards; call for cooperation & reject self-conceit/beg-thy-neighbor practices. https://t.co/C8IW4WhwNP

Wang Yi stressed that our times call for a UN that safeguards world peace, fairness & justice; advocates harmonious co-existence across different races & cultures; champions common development by addressing the North-South gap and effectively responds to global challenges. https://t.co/1rRqWuKptB
